subject: Trades (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The veteran goaltender Ryan Miller is shining for the team with the most points in the N.H.L. after his late season trade to the Blues by the lowly Sabres.
snippet: The veteran goaltender Ryan Miller is shining for the team with the most points in the N.H.L. after his late season trade to the Blues by the lowly Sabres.
